entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, and he is frowning at Hermione because she doesn't have anything except her handbag.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who has managed to fit everything they need into her small beaded handbag using the Undetectable Extension Charm.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another friend of Harry's who needs to change his clothes.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is a magical object that Hermione has managed to fit into her handbag.

entities.name: handbag
entities.description: Hermione's small beaded handbag is used to carry everything they need.

entities.name: jeans
entities.description: Hermione has a pair of jeans that she has managed to fit into her handbag.

entities.name: sweatshirt
entities.description: Hermione has a sweatshirt that she has managed to fit into her handbag.

relationships.description: Harry asks Hermione when she did all this.
Ron is not supposed to have the Invisibility Cloak, but he is given it by Harry.
